name: Distant Drums
overview: An F1 Licenseware fantasy themed real-time strategy game created in Blitz BASIC by Malcolm and Lee Bamber and released in 1996. A small war game where you have 4 worlds to fight and each world has 21 towns. Capture all the towns on any world, you capture a town by ordering your army to attack an winning in this game that plays like a primitive Warcraft 2. You can create additional armies as long as you have enough funds to support them.
